metadata.name: Query Tor Onion Address - DNS Client
metadata.comment: Detects DNS resolution of an .onion address related to Tor routing networks

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM dns_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND metadata.event_code = 3008 AND contains(lower(query.hostname), lower('.onion')))

output.summary: Detects DNS resolution of an .onion address related to Tor routing networks
